meanings.definition: Text that is easily readable and understood.
meanings.sent1: The instructions were written in plaintext language.
meanings.sent2: The book had a plaintext explanation of the topic.
meanings.sent3: The plaintext recipe made it simple to follow.
meanings.sent4: Her plaintext handwriting was neat and clear.
meanings.sent5: The plaintext sign was easy to spot from a distance.

meanings.definition: Data that is not encrypted or encoded.
meanings.sent2: The document was saved in plaintext format.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally sent the plaintext password to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The plaintext file was accessible to anyone.
meanings.sent5: The plaintext message was intercepted by hackers.
